Title: Twelve innocent Israeli Druze children and teenagers were murdered yesterda...
Description: Twelve innocent Israeli Druze children and teenagers were murdered yesterday when Hezbollah launched a rocket from Lebanon that struck a soccer field in Majdal Shams, a Druze town in the Golan Heights of northern Israel. May their memories forever be a blessing. ?#alleyesonmajdalshams #israelunderattack #majdalshamsmassacre

Title: Yesterday, terror group Hezbollah committed a massacre in Majdal Shams, a D...
Description: Yesterday, terror group Hezbollah committed a massacre in Majdal Shams, a Druze town in the Golan Heights of northern Israel. A rocket fired by Hezbollah from Lebanon struck a soccer field, murdering 12 innocent Israeli Druze children and teenagers and injuring many others who were simply playing and enjoying being kids. May their memories forever be a blessing. ?#alleyesonmajdalshams #israelunderattack #majdalshamsmassacre

Title: Family and friends gather for the funeral service to mourn those murdered i...
Description: Family and friends gather for the funeral service to mourn those murdered in the Majdal Shams massacre, where more than 10 children lost their lives when a Hezbollah rocket struck a soccer field in the Druze village of Majdal Shams, northern Israel. May their memories forever be a blessing. ?Photo by David Cohen/Flash90

Title: BREAKING: From the analysis of the IDF?s operational systems, the rocket la...
Description: BREAKING: From the analysis of the IDF?s operational systems, the rocket launch at the center of Majdal Shams was carried out from an area located north of the village of Chebaa in southern Lebanon.According to reliable intelligence information in the possession of the IDF, Hezbollah is behind the attack.
